remarks.format: ## Remarks 此委托是报告依赖项属性更改的特定事件的处理程序签名。This delegate is the handler signature for particular events that report dependency property changes. 使用此处理程序的事件公开为[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件，不是路由事件。An event that uses this handler is exposed as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event, not as a routed event. 通常这些事件遵循命名模式`Is(` *PropertyName*`)Changed`，其中*PropertyName*是的已更改的属性。Typically these events follow the naming pattern `Is(`*PropertyName*`)Changed`, where *PropertyName* is the of the property that changed. 事件的自变量用来查询的属性的旧和新值由特定的事件报告。The arguments of the event are used to query the old and new value of the property, as reported by the particular event. 通常存在 1:1 的对应关系之间没有属性所做的更改和报告的更改的特定事件。Typically there is a 1:1 correspondence between properties that change and a particular event that reports the change. 也很有可能，但通常情况下具有相同的事件报告更改到多个属性。It is also possible, though uncommon, to have the same event report changes to more than one property. 在这种情况下，应检查以确定已更改的属性。In this case, the should be checked to determine the property that changed. 事件数据类比此委托只需使用更为广泛。The event data class has a wider usage than just this delegate. 此外用于通信的数据实现，后者是自定义功能和内部结构的一部分的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]属性系统，并通过虚拟方法，可以重写以提供特定于类的任何依赖项属性的对象上发生更改时发送通知。 is also used to communicate data for implementations, which are part of the customization features and internals of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] property system, and by the virtual method, which can be overridden to provide class-specific notifications whenever any dependency property on the object changes.
